fill_in_the_blanks.question: It was a very hot Saturday afternoon in December
We put our feet in the river to cool off
We swam and swam and forgot about the time

meanings.swim: propel the body through water by using the limbs
meanings.shirt: a garment for the upper body made of cotton or a similar fabric
meanings.splash: a sound made by something striking or falling into liquid
meanings.soak: make something to become thoroughly wet by immersing it in liquid

meanings.chew: bite food in the mouth with the teeth
meanings.shiver: shake slightly and uncontrollably as a result of being cold
